docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Thursday, May 6 -- A ministerial meeting of the Organization of American States voted early today to create an inter-American military force to help restore peace and constitutional government in the Dominican Republic.

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, May 6 -- W. Averell Harriman, President Johnson's ambassador at large, sped between South American capitals today while leftists in the capitals demonstrated against the United States action in the Dominican Republic.

docs.snippet: HAVANA, May 7 -- Charges by the United States that Cuban-trained Communists played a leading role in the rebellion in the Dominican Republic are likely to result in tighter secrecy, concerning foreign guests here.
docs.lead_paragraph: HAVANA, May 7 -- Charges by the United States that Cuban-trained Communists played a leading role in the rebellion in the Dominican Republic are likely to result in tighter secrecy, concerning foreign guests here.
